description: Extracts and categorizes contract clauses from PDF documents into structured JSON format

clauses.text: Contractor agrees to complete all work before receiving payment. Client may withhold payment indefinitely for any reason.
Client may terminate this agreement at any time without notice or compensation. Contractor must provide 60 days written notice.
All work product, including drafts and concepts, becomes exclusive property of Client upon creation.
